title: A product I can always trust
content: Tampax is always a step above the rest when it comes to dependable protection. The multipack prepares you for every day of your cycle, from beginning to end. Workout reliable for those of us always on the move. Though the product is a little more expensive, you can't beat the leakproof protection. I always buy tampax. My periods are heavy, and I work in a very busy medical practice. I have to have something that is going to get me through. This product always does the trick. I'll always spend a little more to get a better quality product.
